nfcFallback: Web NFC is not supported. Please use Chrome on Android.
placeholderRead: No data read yet. Scan an NFC tag to display the data here.

messages.scanToReadInfo: To read, simply touch the NFC tag with your phone. The app will open automatically.
messages.nfcNotSupported: Web NFC is not supported on this device.
messages.readPrompt: Please hold an NFC tag to the device to read...
messages.writePrompt: Please hold an NFC tag to the device to write...
messages.payloadTooLarge: Data is too large for the NFC tag (max. 880 bytes).
messages.writeSuccess: Data successfully written to the tag.
messages.readSuccess: NFC tag successfully read and data imported!
messages.noKnownContent: No known text content found on the NFC tag.
messages.noDataToCopy: No scanned data available to copy.
messages.loadSuccess: JSON file successfully loaded and applied to form.
messages.writeAttempt: Write attempt {attempt}/{total}... Please hold the phone steady.

errors.v1NoData: v1 format, but no data found.
errors.NotAllowedError: Access denied. Please grant NFC permission.
errors.NotSupportedError: NFC is not supported by your browser.
errors.NotReadableError: The NFC tag could not be read.
errors.NetworkError: Connection to the tag is unstable. Please hold the phone steady and directly on the NFC tag.
errors.AbortError: The operation was aborted by the user.
errors.WriteTimeoutError: Write operation timed out. Please remove the phone from the tag and try again.
errors.tagEmpty: The NFC tag is empty or could not be read.
